Test 8 of 108 in ../resources/tests19.dat failed. Input:
<!doctype html><form><isindex>
Got:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>
|       <isindex>
Expected:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>

Test 9 of 108 in ../resources/tests19.dat failed. Input:
<!doctype html><isindex action="POST">
Got:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <isindex>
|       action="POST"
Expected:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>
|       action="POST"
|       <hr>
|       <label>
|         "This is a searchable index. Enter search keywords: "
|         <input>
|           name="isindex"
|       <hr>

Test 10 of 108 in ../resources/tests19.dat failed. Input:
<!doctype html><isindex prompt="this is isindex">
Got:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <isindex>
|       prompt="this is isindex"
Expected:
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>
|       <hr>
|       <label>
|         "this is isindex"
|         <input>
|           name="isindex"
|       <hr>

|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <isindex>

Expected:

| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>
|       <hr>
|       <label>

|         <input>
|           name="isindex"
|           type="hidden"
|       <hr>

|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <isindex>
|       name="foo"
Expected:

| <html>

|   <body>
